title: Discord Verification
body:
This is the verification discussion for Discord reporting as per the discussion below:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/xkRfEHZs-discord-moderation

Post your discord tag here and type @moderators in the #verification channel. The moderators will cross check and approve you on the server. Make sure to follow the rules below as this feature is a privilege and will be removed if abused.

**Server Rules**
1. Always be respectful to Moderators and Rioters. Harassment and insults will not be tolerated.
2. Do not spam. Please.
3. This is a privilege and any abuse will result in a ban from using this service.

replies.body:
where is the list of moderating guidelines located

before any of you reply with "its up to discretion", thats false. there is a rules page,
no forum functions without restricting the power of its moderators, so a document must exist somewhere
that in detail limits their actions; requiring a certain occurrence(s) for each permitted act of authority.

there has to be guidelines on:
warnings
bans
removal of threads
removal of comments
relocating threads

the "universal rules" page does not have this information.



i do not have discord. i shouldnt have to make an account to get answers,  a mod locked my post with no warrant from what i could see.
harassment onto me, but thats a reason to lock it? sounds like a reason to penalize the individuals harassing and spamming me on it.
You don't need to download Discord. Just open it in a web browser tab. It works just fine.
i am not comfortable using it.  i have 0 reasons to believe it is a secure website. lets talk on here.
I'm just trying to be informative. Its secure.

thanks, but no thanks.  i have no reason to believe it is secure, or a random guy telling me it is.

a mod told me to come here to talk,
obviously he wanted me to use discord not the forums. not happening. have a good day mang
This thread is for Discord verification purposes only. If you do not wish to use Discord, submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
